Articles.Content:
Hey everyone.

So I just started this highly enjoyable time suck about a week ago. Having a lot of fun and man do you guys have some great info and assistance. Looking forward to getting to know you guys.

Fly safe, or not.

Welcome, 3ntropy!

Glad to have you aboard. Looking forward to getting to know you, too.

Happy landings!

\0

Take a look at all the great info in the Tutorials section! All-though, a lot of them need to be updated for 1.0.

You're lucky- you don't have to relearn all the things you learned in <.90.

Welcome!
Welcome aboard, I hope you will not cause a heat death on the forums.
